awards: [{'title': 'Holland Scholarship', 'description': None, 'issuer': 'Dutch Ministry of Education', 'date': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, {'title': 'IIT Madras Summer Fellowship', 'description': 'Awarded IIT Madras Summer Fellowship during May-July 2014  to carry out research in Machine Design Section.', 'issuer': 'Indian Institute of Technology Madras', 'date': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}]
projects: [{'title': 'Design of composite wind turbine tower', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'description': "Key tasks of the project involve developing conceptual composite tower in tubular as well as lattice structure. Identify important design parameters and design loads. Decide on composite material layup, geometry and include static and fatigue failure check. Qualitative analysis of joining technique based on geometry. Another focus of the project is to develop cost model which takes into account different manufacturing methods available and it's corresponding process cost. Tool for designing composite tower was developed using matlab.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Shreya', 'last_name': 'Kamath', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Materials Specialist at DAF Trucks NV'}]}, {'title': 'Modelling & Experimental studies on the dynamics of bolted joints', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'description': 'The work focused on understanding the dynamics of bolted joints and was carried out on a laboratory scale single bolted lap joint. The dynamic stiffness of the joint was found using substructure decoupling method. This dynamic stiffness can be used for accurate numerical modelling and the response of the overall structure was predicted which lead to a reliable detection technique than monitoring other modal parameters like natural frequency & damping. Parallel a FEM model was created using Altair HyperMesh and analysed using ANSYS. The model has been validated and the concept is now being extended to joints with multiple bolts.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Shreya', 'last_name': 'Kamath', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Materials Specialist at DAF Trucks NV'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'ATHUL', 'last_name': 'RAO', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Structural Analyst at DAF Trucks NV'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Anmol', 'last_name': 'Gaurav', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Accenture Global Strategy and Consulting | IIM Calcutta  | NITK Surathkal'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Dr Gangadharan', 'last_name': 'K V', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Head Centre for System Design at National Institute of Technology Karnataka'}]}, {'title': 'Effect of geometry modification on vibration response of bridge structure', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'description': 'This project was carried out under the guidance of Prof. C.Sujatha and her PhD student Sudheesh Kumar C.P. at Machine Design Section, IIT Madras. The effect of geometry on the free vibration response of simply supported beam was studied. The goal of the analysis was to arrive at a desirable double tapered geometry of the beam which causes minimum free vibration response at mid span due to single point moving load. The optimum geometry played a critical role in increasing the resonance frequencies so as to enable traversal of high speed vehicles. Interesting results were observed in numerical analysis carried out by ANSYS and validated experimentally.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Shreya', 'last_name': 'Kamath', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Materials Specialist at DAF Trucks NV'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sudheesh', 'last_name': 'Kumar C.P.', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Associate Professor in Mechanical Engineering at Govt. College of Engineering, Kannur'}, {'type': 'nonStandardizedContributor', 'first_name': None, 'last_name': None, 'name': 'C. Sujatha', 'headline': None}]}]
